name: Liberation Special Forces
description:
This is tactical and strategy first person shooter that you lead a small squad with different weapons to eliminate opressors to avoid them from terrorising free people

In this game you become the predator of the opressor of free living beings, in order to liberate people from their opression of a group of agressive enemies.
In order to do so you will:

Use strategy, flanking, supressive fire, stealth and a variety of weapons.

You can have like 10 different weapons and items in order to defeat your enemy:
Sniper rifles: Good for long range.
Machineguns: Good to supress and scare the enemy from their position, and also keep a position overwatched.
Assault rifles: Good to attack the enemy locaiton with light and good effectivity.
